external_links.text: CAN/CGSB-32.312 Organic Production Systems – Aquaculture – General principles, management standards and permitted substances lists
external_links.context: Be certified to the Organic Aquaculture Standard CAN/CGSB-32.312 Organic Production Systems – Aquaculture – General principles, management standards and permitted substances lists by a CFIA accredited certification body Be included within the scope of an equivalency arrangement in order to be imported into Canada
